document_data.name: Azak
document_data.mainbody:
Tracker '''Azak''' was a [[goblin]] devotee of [[the Absolute]] who dwelled within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|Leave me aloneâ€”ain't got time for chatter.|Azak.}}
document_data.Description: She had vibrant orange skin and curly black hair she wore braided back in the center, and sheared along the sides.
document_data.Personality: Azak was wholly focused on her duties in the [[cult of the Absolute]] and did not abide any distractions.
document_data.History: Following the cult's raid of [[Waukeen's Rest]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Azak remained stationed in the inner chambers of the Shattered Sanctum.
